data.title: "We should always explore the things that we are a little afraid of." 2020 physics laureate Andrea Ghez encourages us all to explore and...
data.meta_description:
2,059 likes, 13 comments - nobelprize_org on November 14, 2022: ""We should always explore the things that we are a little afraid of." 

2020 physics laureate Andrea Ghez encourages us all to explore and try things that scare us a little. 

Ghez will be joining our discussion on the future of life on 9 December. What do we hope for, what matters in life, what does a better future look like, and how far into that future should we be looking? These questions will form the starting points for a day dedicated to exploring our future together. 

Register to receive your ticket by clicking the link in bio.

Photo credit: Elena Zhukova/University of California

#NobelPrize".
